page.title: 09EDUCATION IN BERKSHIRE
page.content: We have many different sorts of schools around Slough.In Slough there are Lower schools from 5-8 years, Middle schools 8-12 years and then a test to go to a Grammar or Secondary Modern school.There are also several private schools. In Windsor they have Lower schools 5-9years,Middle 9-13 years and High Schools after that.They don't have a 12+ exam. In Maidenhead they have Primary schools from 5-11 years then Comprehensive schools for everyone. You can see it can be confusing for people who move here.Some people choose where to buy their houses so that they can have the sort of schools they like.
